name: type
description: Description: The type of the preview card.

name: author_name
description: Description: The author of the original resource.

name: author_url
description: Description: A link to the author of the original resource.

name: provider_name
description: Description: The provider of the original resource.

name: provider_url
description: Description: A link to the provider of the original resource.

name: html
description: Description: HTML to be used for generating the preview card.

name: width
description: Description: Width of preview, in pixels.

name: height
description: Description: Height of preview, in pixels.

name: embed_url
description: Description: Used for photo embeds, instead of custom html.

name: blurhash
description: Description: A hash computed by the BlurHash algorithm, for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.
